title: How to Get a Team Fortress 2 Spray

steps.headline: Find an image you want from the internet.
steps.description: The image can be of these formats: jpg,bmp,tga, and vtf. If you already have an image, skip these first two steps.

steps.headline: Memorize the location of your image (e.g.
Launch TF2.

steps.headline: In the spray section, click browse.

steps.headline: Hit the Apply button and then click OK.
Enter a server and test your spray.

text:
Find an image you want from the internet. The image can be of these formats: jpg,bmp,tga, and vtf. If you already have an image, skip these first two steps. Download the image you found. Memorize the location of your image (e.g. C/Users/User1/Downloads/[image.jpeg]). Launch TF2. The options are the Multiplayer tab. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/80\/Get-a-Team-Fortress-2-Spray-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Get-a-Team-Fortress-2-Spray-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/8\/80\/Get-a-Team-Fortress-2-Spray-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/aid3864603-v4-728px-Get-a-Team-Fortress-2-Spray-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":288,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"455","licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} In the spray section, click browse. Find your image, and click OK. Hit the Apply button and then click OK. Enter a server and test your spray.
